text: ...the drama of the disenchanted man who threw himself into the street from the tenth floor, and as he fell he saw through the windows the intimacy of his neighbors, the little domestic tragedies, the stealthy loves, the brief moments of happiness, whose news had never reached the common staircase, so that in the instant of crashing against the pavement of the street he had completely changed his conception of the world, and had come to the conclusion that the life he left forever by the false door was worth living. FIN
title: El drama del desencantado
author: Gabriel García Márquez
